text:
integrate.ai | Toronto, Canada | Full-stack, Data Science, Product | ONSITE |

At integrate.ai, our mission is to build a future in which AI enriches peopleâ€™s lives while creating better, more valuable businesses. Our AI-powered platform helps B2C enterprises become customer-centric, identifying what customers value in businesses and applying AI to guide customers to valuable experiences. We care about privacy and ethics, and are working to make Responsible AI a reality across consumer enterprise. We are proudly based in downtown Toronto, Canada at the center of an exciting AI ecosystem.

We're looking to hire: -Data Scientists (Use the science from the platform to solve problems for customers) -Machine Learning Scientists (Build the science that powers the platform) -Platform Engineers (Build the platform we want to grow on) -Solutions Engineers (Use the platform to solve problems for customers) -More roles on the website (business dev, product, operations)

Tech Stack: - Hive (SQL/HQL) - Python - Spark - AWS/GCP - Terraform/Ansible - React/Redux

Please apply on our website: https://www.integrate.ai/careers
